hero.title: Your gateway to
hero.subtitle: Automatically deploy canonical bridged ERC20 to an L2. Start bridging and adding liquidity to earn rewards all in one place.

first.title: Easy
first.content: whether you’re new to L2s, or you don’t have a technical team. Supermigrate makes it easy

second.title: Fast
second.content: Never loose a sleep, fully automated process.

third.title: Earn
third.content: Earn rewards and Incentives for getting on L2s

first.title: Deploy canonical bridged tokens
first.content: We're providing a straightforward process for users to deploy their ERC20 tokens on L2 networks that automatically makes it bridgable.

second.title: Move tokens across L1 <> L2
second.content: We are making it seamless for users to transfer assets between L1 and L2 networks.

third.title: Add Liquidity for newly deployed tokens
third.content: An interface that makes it easy for people to provide liquidity for any recently migrated tokens on L2 and get rewarding for doing that.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Supermigrate and our integrations

question1.question: Is it possible to migrate tokens with different names and tickers to Base?
question1.answer: Yes, during the migration process, you should check the “Override” option. This will require addition manual review.

question2.question: How can you see or check documentation or code references for Supermigrate?
question2.answer: Here is a link to our github repository: https: //github.com/supermigrate

question3.question: Does Supermigrate support two-way bridging?
question3.answer: Yes, with our superbridge integration, you can go from L1 ⇒ L2 and back.

question4.question: What bridging mechanism is used for Supermigrate?
question4.answer: The tokens are deployed using the official OptimismMintableERC20Factory. After token deployment, you can bridge the tokens on our bridging interface which is powered by superbridge.

question5.question: How many Layer 2 networks are supported currently?
question5.answer: We currently support Base, Optimism, and Mode. We are actively adding more networks. Reach out to integrations@metastablelabs.xyz for integration requests

question6.question: Are Polygon tokens supported by Supermigrate?
question6.answer: No, currently it only supports Ethereum to L2 migrations.
